name: neomimalloc
description: Wrapper to use mimalloc in D with the support of high-level API std.experimental.allocator.

configurations.name: standard
preBuildCommands-posix: cd $PACKAGE_DIR/neomimalloc/source/mimalloc && rm -rf build && mkdir build && cd build && cmake -DMI_OVERRIDE=OFF .. && make

configurations.name: secure
preBuildCommands-posix: cd $PACKAGE_DIR/neomimalloc/source/mimalloc && rm -rf build && mkdir build && cd build && cmake -DMI_OVERRIDE=OFF -DMI_SECURE=ON .. && make

configurations.name: override-malloc
preBuildCommands-posix: cd $PACKAGE_DIR/neomimalloc/source/mimalloc && rm -rf build && mkdir build && cd build && cmake -DMI_OVERRIDE=ON .. && make

configurations.name: override-malloc-secure
preBuildCommands-posix: cd $PACKAGE_DIR/neomimalloc/source/mimalloc && rm -rf build && mkdir build && cd build && cmake -DMI_OVERRIDE=ON -DMI_SECURE=ON .. && make
